title: How much would you rate my dancing from the scale of 1 to 10 for my BELIFT audition? - Quora

response.answer_text: My dearest, it was 🔥 lit but please please🙏 don't put your fuckin video on this type of plateform like here ! Because people will Easily judge you they can Easily demotivate you they even hurt you by insulting you people are here not are dance teacher so, go and show your talent to someone who 👌💯 really cares who knows the values If you have any questions🙋 you can ask me on my Instagram handle I will definitely help you I'll hope you'll inspire Add some values to your life You can also follow me on Instagram @pirdhan_aman
hmm I would say 7/10 you seem super energetic and you facial expressions are great. but your a little too loose for the movements i think you just need more control and balance. thank u ^^ ~b
